Bank account verification

It has come to our attention that the account information provided may be inaccurate or contain an error.

Once you have completed your policy activation, we will make an effort to get in touch with you to review this. Alternatively, you can contact us on 0861 33 93 39 after completing your activation to ensure that your account information is correct.

Please note that failure to correct the error may result in the cancellation of your cover.

Once your policy is active, you can update your banking details through our call centre on 0861 33 93 39.

Should you proceed, your policy will be processed with the details submitted during your final attempt.

You cannot submit new or update existing banking details online after this attempt, but you can continue to get cover.

details.label: Confirm that you agree with our

details.html: Pro-rata

Pro-rata refers to a portion of something and, in insurance, it's usually used in reference to premiums. For example, if you took out an insurance policy on 20 June, you would only pay a portion of the monthly premium (a pro-rata premium) because you only had cover for a portion of the month (10 days instead of the full 30).
No-claims period

A two-week no-claim period will apply to any {{naturalDisasterAndArea}}.

No claims related to these incident/s will be considered within two weeks of policy commencement.
